common.structuredApproach: Our Structured Approach to Project Execution
common.processDescription: At NearUp, we begin with a thorough requirements analysis to understand our clients' specific needs. We then develop tailored solutions based on agile methodologies, ensuring efficient implementation. Our team accompanies you throughout the entire process to ensure your expectations are exceeded.
common.stepByStepDescription: We place great emphasis on transparency and communication.

careers.title: Shape Your Future with NearUp
careers.description: Discover exciting career opportunities in an innovative environment. Become part of a dynamic team at the forefront of technology.
careers.splitDescription: At NearUp, we focus on innovation and teamwork to create outstanding IT solutions. A career with us means being part of a dynamic environment where your ideas are valued and encouraged.

jobs.title: Software Developer
jobs.description: We are looking for a creative software developer who develops innovative solutions for our customers. Work in a dynamic team and help shape the digital future. Apply now and become part of our success story!

jobs.title: IT Consultant
jobs.description: As an IT Consultant, you will support our clients in implementing customized solutions. Use your expertise to master complex challenges. Be part of an international team and contribute to digital transformation!

benefits.description: At Nearup, we offer you the opportunity to actively shape your career.

benefits.description: We support your personal and professional development through targeted training.

benefits.title: Experience the Diversity of International Projects in a Dynamic Team
benefits.description: Work on innovative solutions with colleagues from different cultures.

hero.title: Innovative
hero.subtitle: Software Solutions for Your Industry
hero.description: At NearUp, we offer customized IT solutions tailored to your company's specific needs. Let's drive your digital transformation together.

intro.title: Learn more about NearUp: Your Partner for Digital Transformation.
intro.description: NearUp Software & Consultation GmbH was founded in 2020 in Berlin and offers comprehensive IT solutions. Our core competencies lie in agile software development, IT consulting, and system integration for various industries.

mission.subtitle: Innovation
mission.title: Our Mission and Vision for the Future
mission.description: At NearUp, we strive to drive digital transformation through innovative IT solutions. Our goal is to support companies in turning their visions into reality.

timeline.subtitle: Our Journey
timeline.title: Key Milestones in Our Growth Story

milestones.title: Foundation in Berlin
milestones.description: NearUp Software & Consultation GmbH was established with a vision to drive digital transformation through innovative IT solutions.

milestones.title: First Major Projects
milestones.description: Successfully delivered enterprise-level software solutions for clients in healthcare and fintech sectors.

milestones.title: International Expansion
milestones.description: Expanded our operations to serve clients across Europe and established partnerships with leading technology providers.

milestones.title: AI Integration Focus
milestones.description: Launched specialized AI integration services and strengthened our position in custom software development.

vision.subtitle: Development
vision.title: Our Vision for the Coming Years
vision.description: We focus on continuous innovation and adaptation to new technologies. Our goal is to always offer our customers the best solutions.

success.subtitle: Success
success.title: Our Success in Numbers and Facts
success.description: NearUp has achieved remarkable progress in recent years. Our customized software solutions have increased our clients' efficiency by up to 30%. We are proud to deliver innovative technologies that bring real results.

contact.title: Get in Touch Now
contact.description: Let's start your digital transformation together and develop customized solutions.

healthcare.heroDescription: Discover our tailor-made software solutions for the pharmaceutical industry, driving innovation and efficiency.
healthcare.title: Tailor-made IT solutions for the pharmaceutical industry: innovative, effective and reliable.
healthcare.description: In the pharmaceutical industry, precise software solutions are essential. Our team offers customized software developments that are tailored to the specific requirements of the industry. In addition, we support you with comprehensive IT consulting and system integration.

consulting.title: Optimal IT Consulting for Pharmaceutical Companies
consulting.description: We help you optimize your processes through innovative technologies.

integration.title: System Integration for Pharma
integration.description: Benefit from seamless integrations that connect your systems.

success.title: Success Stories
success.description: Read our case studies to learn more about our successes.

benefits.title: The Benefits of Working with NearUp for Healthcare Companies
benefits.description: Healthcare companies benefit from our expertise in software development and IT consulting. We offer tailored solutions that maximize efficiency, compliance, and data security.

efficiency.title: Efficiency
efficiency.description: Optimized processes lead to faster decisions and lower operational costs.

compliance.title: Compliance
compliance.description: Our solutions ensure compliance with all relevant regulations and standards.

vision.title: Efficient Project Implementation in the Pharmaceutical Industry
vision.description: NearUp takes a structured approach to executing projects in the pharmaceutical industry. From requirements analysis to implementation, we offer customized solutions that meet the specific needs of our customers.

sections.title: Requirements Analysis and Planning
sections.description: We begin with a thorough requirements analysis to understand your project's specific needs. Our team works closely with you to create a detailed plan that covers all aspects.

sections.title: Implementation and Testing
sections.description: After planning, we efficiently implement the solutions and conduct comprehensive testing. This ensures that all functions work flawlessly and meet the highest standards.

sections.title: Maintenance and Support
sections.description: Our commitment doesn't end with implementation. We provide ongoing maintenance and support to ensure your systems continue to function optimally.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: We look forward to your inquiry and are happy to answer any questions.

blog.heroSubtitle: Explore our blog for the latest updates, insights, and expert advice on software development and technology. From in-depth articles to thought-provoking discussions, we provide valuable content to keep you ahead of the curve.

faq.title: Here you will find answers to frequently asked questions about our IT consulting services.

questions.question: What is IT consulting?
questions.answer: IT consulting is the professional consulting of companies in questions of information technology. We support you in planning, implementing and optimizing your IT strategy.

questions.question: How long does it take?
questions.answer: The duration of the consulting depends on the complexity of your company and the number of questions. We can usually present you with a report with our results and recommendations within 2-4 weeks.

questions.question: What industries do you serve?
questions.answer: We serve all industries that need an individual IT strategy to achieve their business goals. We support you in developing and implementing IT solutions tailored to your needs.

questions.question: How does the cooperation work?
questions.answer: We work in a team and advise you together. We advise you in all questions of information technology and support you in implementing your IT strategy.

questions.question: What technologies do you use?
questions.answer: We use the latest technologies and methods to optimize your IT strategy. We advise you in all questions of information technology and support you in implementing your IT strategy.
